channel.title: Weird Waves
channel.description: Audio horror broadcasting online, from Old Time Radio to freaky modern podcasts.

item.title: News: 2024-05-12
item.description: Fixed a font rendering problem in Chrome and Safari (and possibly other non-Firefox browsers) on MacOS, in which text was displayed with more space above than below.

item.title: News: 2024-02-18
item.description: Added one new show: The Abominations of Yondo, by Clark Ashton Smith, in the LibriVox selection.

item.title: News: 2024-01-28
item.description: Weird Waves is officially finished! There may be small future changes (e.g. adding new links to the Links section, like I just did now), but as a rule it's done.
